org.openmuc.jrxtx

Class SerialPortBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmuc.jrxtx.SerialPortBuilder

  • public class SerialPortBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for SerialPorts. Provides a convenient way to set the various fields of a SerialPort. Example: 
     
 SerialPort port = newBuilder("/dev/ttyS0")
                   .setBaudRate(19200)
                   .setParity(Parity.EVEN)
                   .build();
 InputStream is = port.getInputStream();
 ..

        public SerialPort build()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Combine all of the options that have been set and return a new SerialPort object.
        Returns:
